Hey guys,

A couple of T206 HOFers for sale.

Joss pitching Polar Bear - $240 PENDING - Card has obvious flaws seen in scan.  There is a tear from the left border to his forearm, the rest are creases.

Walsh portrait - $400 SOLD - Nice card but what looks like white paint (or something) dripped on the left border (it is not paper loss).  Some other dings and imperfections but no major creases.

PM if interested.  Prices are dlvd net to me PPFF or +3% for G&S.  Shipped in puffy with tracking.

Thanks,

Andy



.
I'll take the Walsh... Pm sent
